# shouldMatchFrameRate

**Instance Property**

A property indicating whether the frame rate of the external display should be configured to match the camera’s frame rate.

## Declaration

```swift
var shouldMatchFrameRate: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you want to configure your [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureVideoPreviewLayer] to match its source [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/activeVideoMinFrameDuration], set [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureExternalDisplayConfiguration/shouldMatchFrameRate] to `true`. The default value is `false`.

## Modifying the configuration

- **bypassColorSpaceConversion**: A property indicating whether the color space of the configurator’s preview layer should be preserved on the output display by avoiding color space conversions.
- **preferredResolution**: Your preferred external display resolution.
